text: Abigail Breslin and Colt Prattes as Baby and Johnny ( Picture : ABC ) The TV movie of the 1987 hit Dirty Dancing aired in the UK last night and was widely panned by critics. Click and Collect review : Stephen Merchant and Asim Chaudhry are a charming force The first rule of TV remakes is this : Don ’ t make TV remakes. Classics should stay just that. But does anyone ever listen? No, no they don ’ t. There are a few rare occasions where taking a film to television has worked – take last year ’ s live televised version of Grease starring Vanessa Hudgens and Julianne Hough, for example.
